title: Can you trust ancestry DNA kits?
description: Are DNA ancestry tests a reliable way to trace your ancestry?

vocabItems.definition: diagram that shows all the members of a family, usually over a long period of time, and how they are related to each other
the origins of your family; your ancestors who lived a long time ago

vocabItems.word: take (it) with a pinch of salt
vocabItems.definition: do not believe that something is completely accurate or true; be doubtful or sceptical about something
relatives who lived in the past
social, cultural and linguistic characteristics shared by a large group of people
